ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 50+ bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I m hoping that at least 51 will be purchaseable right off the bat. I bought and scribed Circle of Combines for my druid last night. I was tempted to cast it.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm hoping that at least 51 will be purchaseable right off the bat. I bought
and scribed Circle of Combines for my druid last night. I was tempted to
cast it. I'm sure it will probably just safe zone you, but knowing Verant it
might throw you out of the world or something. I'm not following you on the
last name question.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] 50+ bard songs
>Date: Sun, 23 Apr 2000 10:19:04 -0400
>
>i think we've only gotten enchanter, cleric, and shaman spells from sky so
>far. the portals for druids and wizards are available for purchase at the
>gypsy camp in north karana, and you can scribe them (level 34) now. no
>idea
>on bard songs, anyone else hope we can just buy them as always? =) i heard
>some spells/songs you can buy, some throught quests/research, some through
>random drop, or maybe more than one of the above.
>
>what is the new last name?
>
>Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
